scripts.network: npm run build:happ && BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) INTERNAL_IP=$(internal-ip --ipv4) concurrently -k "npm run local-services" "UI_PORT=1420 npm start -w ui" "npm run launch"
scripts.android:network: BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) INTERNAL_IP=$(internal-ip --ipv4) concurrently -k "npm run local-services" "UI_PORT=1420 npm start -w ui" "npm run tauri dev" "npm run tauri android dev"
